text: - Hello, my name is Topp Jirayut,
I'm the Founder and Group CEO of Bitkub.
We are one of the largest blockchain

and cryptocurrency
companies here in Thailand.

The company has been around
for three years and 11 months.
We have about 1,470 employees.

And we are one of the
fastest-growing startups in Thailand.
And one of the very first unicorn.

Right now, Bitkub is using
50 different applications
to help us work smarter.

And AWS is one of our
cloud-based technology

that help us, as a company,
to scale very quickly.
- My name is Phuwadon Potithong.

I am Chief Technology
Officer at Bitkub Online.

The team has taken steps to
redesign and adopt containers

to support the platform,
and speed up delivery.

We need to support the
growing demand and transition,
as well as need to add new features.
Containers allow for the ability
to develop more powerful applications
that use microservices
That can take advantage of a scalable,
reliable architecture on AWS Cloud.

- We have been growing
at 1000% every year,
since the inception of the company.
And with AWS as our partner,
we can scale to keep up with our growth.
AWS also has a very compliant mind.
They are able to work with regulators,
educating the local market,

to make sure that we can
keep data and service
in the most compliant way.

- We need to support our 24/7
online business and teams,
our ability to quickly adapt to change

and plan for the future scaling
increase our effectiveness.

Utilizing AWS Cloud,
we now have a platform
to support day-to-day operation
and allow our team to do proof of concept.

We are confident that we will
be able to grow our market
and client base to more foreign country,
since AWS has the largest and most dynamic community,
with millions of active customer
and 10,000 partner worldwide.
- With this growth rate,
we intend to expand our target base
internationally next year.

And AWS would be the ideal
cloud services provider

to help us realize
Bitkub's full potential.
